suite.name: MimiTest

kw.name: Begin App Test
kw.doc: Mimi hearing test is launched

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://github.com/appium/appium/blob/master/docs/en/writing-running-appium/server-args.md | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | no | alias |

test.name: User should be able to log and out of their account

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Go to Log In Page
kw.doc: User is directed to landing page

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Enter Email Address
kw.doc: Enter user name

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Enter Password
kw.doc: Enter password

kw.name: Input Password
kw.doc: Types the given password into text field identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Swipe By Percent
kw.doc: Swipe from one percent of the screen to another percent, for an optional duration. Normal swipe fails to scale for different screen resolutions, this can be avoided using percent.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.arg: //android.widget.TextView[@resource-id='android:id/message' and @text='This will disable your Hearing ID.']
kw.doc: Waits until element specified with `locator` appears on current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click element identified by `locator`.

kw.doc: Goes one step backward in the browser history.

suite.doc: This is a functional test suite for Mimi Hearning Technology
